description: Gets a Databricks credential configuration object for an account, both specified by ID.

credentials_id.description: Databricks Account API credential configuration ID

credentials_name.description: The human-readable name of the credential configuration object.

account_id.description: The Databricks account ID that hosts the credential.

creation_time.description: Time in epoch milliseconds when the credential was created.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
